thread.title: 21 Colorful Wedding Dresses for Non-Traditional Brides
thread.title_full: 21 Colorful Wedding Dresses for Non-Traditional Brides

author: Emma Arendoski
title: 21 Colorful Wedding Dresses for Non-Traditional Brides
text:
Something old, something new, something borrowed, something… blue! Purple! Black! If you’re dreaming of a colorful wedding dress as an alternative to a white bridal gown, you’ve come to the right place.
The white wedding dress has long been the classic, conventional choice for many brides. But what if I told you that more brides are turning away from this tradition and wearing colorful wedding dresses instead? The white gown is getting a dramatic makeover as some brides opt for something a bit more fun and non conventional. In this blog post, we’ll show you the trend of colorful wedding dresses and you’ll quickly see why they’re growing in popularity. Let me know in the comments which dress is your top pick!
chrissy wai ching
Colorful Wedding Dresses for Non-Traditional Brides
Why Choose a Non White Wedding Dress?
Colorful wedding dresses are a fun and fun way to express your personality! Whether you’re looking to break the mold and try something different or you’re dreaming of vibrant images from your big day, you’re perfect for a colored bridal gown.
We’re also seeing brides opt for a colorful wedding gown as a 2nd dress to change into, like a reception dress. But instead of a white dress for the 2nd style, they slip into a fun and colorful alternative bridal gown instead.
Another way to tie in this trend even just a little bit is with the “magic” tulle skirt from
StylishBrideAccs. If you look closely, you’ll see underneath some of the tulle is black for a fun twist on the traditional all white bridal gown. stylishbrideaccs
Different styles and colors of colorful wedding dresses
Most wedding gowns are white, ivory, champagne, off-white, or a variation thereof. But non white wedding dresses are available in any color of the rainbow: pastel shades, bold colors, jewel tones, ombre effects, prints, floral embroidery, and so much more. Gothic black bridal gowns are also a notable trend we’re seeing more of these days.
A colorful wedding dress is just as flowy, unique, and show-stopping as a traditional bridal gown when you know where to look, which we’ll cover in this next section.
Where to Find Colorful Wedding Dress Ideas
For this trend, we turned to a favorite place:
Etsy! There are plenty of colorful wedding dress designers on the site that offer highly-rated colored bridal gown options. Here are some of our top picks!

This multi colored wedding dress features a gorgeous ombre effect. By

Tips for Choosing a Wedding Dress That Is Not White
If you’re opting for a non-traditional bridal gown, note the color you’re looking for and align it to the season of when you’re tying the knot. You’ll also want to choose a hue that complements your skin tone, the theme colors of your wedding, and that YOU like to wear.
In conclusion, colorful wedding dresses for non-traditional brides is a fun wedding trend 2024 brides are exploring! The traditional white wedding gown is being replaced in some places by colorful wedding dresses. These are available in different colors, lengths, styles, and shapes.
https://www.etsy.com offers some great choices for unique colored bridal gown options. When choosing a non white wedding dress, be sure to select one that complements your skin tone, wedding theme, season, and personal style.
ON TO YOU: What do you think of these colorful wedding dress options? Do you like this trend: yes or no? Tell us in the comment box below!
